amendment.description: To modify the authorization period for the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 112 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 112 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 111. (consideration: CR S1109) To modify the authorization period for the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 112 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 112 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 111.
